attributes.action: strictly enforce vehicle engine and audio equipment noise levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are all paying a high price for years of unrestricted growth of motor vehicles on our roads. The very least the Government can do is mitigate this by strictly enforcing basic acceptable noise levels. Noisy motorbikes, powerful car entertainment systems and large bore exahusts are making life a misery for us all. There is no reason why this should be tolerated. Lets do something about it.
